= Acknowledgements =

The scripts in this package depend on many other R and R/Bioconductor packages: methods, ROCR, Biobase, gplots, beanplot, subselect, randomForest, glmnet, mclust, pROC, simpleaffy, plyr, MASS and of course many other packages that are part of the base R. A huge thanks to the R and R/Bioconductor package developers, to the community and to the mailing lists & discussion forums. Also thanks to vim-r-plugin and R-studio developers.
